metadata.dc:author: del Palacio, Amalia
Garau, Margarita
metadata.dc:description: We present a Cryptococcus neoformans knee joint infection in a diabetic renal transplant patient treated with steroids, cyclosporin, and mycofenolate mofetil. We discuss reported cases of cryptococcal arthritis.
metadata.dc:title: Artritis por Cryptococcus neoformans en receptor de trasplante renal.
[Cryptococcus neoformans arthritis in a renal transplant recipient].
